Title: The Department of Puberty
Writer: Nick Kroll (created by), Andrew Goldberg (created by), Mark Levin (created by), Jennifer Flackett (created by), Gil Ozeri
Actors: Fred Armisen, Bobby Cannavale, Neil Casey, Jessica Chaffin
Plot: After traveling through a magic portal to puberty headquarters, Nick seeks out a new Hormone Monster and Jessi bonds with the Depression Kitty.
